main event: A round object with an object hanging underneath was observed drifting slowly to the East for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed through field glasses and appeared the size of a pen,The sighting likely occurred shortly after a radiosonde balloon was released from Idlewild Airport,The report suggests the possibility of the sighted object being a balloon or aircraft,Visibility was noted as 15 miles with thin clouds at 20,000 feet,There were no other reports received regarding this sighting.
sighted object: one round object with something hanging underneath
